document_data.mainbody: '''Hatred domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with [[spell]]s and powers inspired by hatred.
document_data.Powers: They gained an evil boost to their combat skills and resistance versus a single selected foe for one minute a day.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[doom]]'', ''[[scare]]'', and ''[[bestow curse]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[song of discord]]'',<ref group="note">In the 3.5-edition ''Player's Guide to Faer√ªn'', ''song of discord'' replaced the [[emotion]] (hate-only) spell. ''[[righteous might]]'', and ''[[forbiddance]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[blasphemy]]'', ''[[antipathy]]'', and ''[[wail of the banshee]]''.
